frames.timing

Interface Animator

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AnimatorObject

    public interface Animator
    Interface defining the behavior animated objects should implement.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void animate()
      Main call back animated method.
      long period()
      Returns the animation period in milliseconds.
      void restart()
      Simply calls stop() and then start().
      void setPeriod(long period)
      Sets the animation period in milliseconds.
      void start()
      Starts the animation executing periodically the animated call back method.
      boolean started()
      Returns true if animation was started and false otherwise.
      void stop()
      Stops the animation.
      SequentialTimer timer()
      Returns the sequential timer.
      void toggle()
      Toggles the animation

    • Method Detail

      • animate

        void animate()
        Main call back animated method.

      • period

        long period()
        Returns the animation period in milliseconds.

      • setPeriod

        void setPeriod(long period)
        Sets the animation period in milliseconds. Restarts the animation if it already started().

      • stop

        void stop()
        Stops the animation.

      • start

        void start()
        Starts the animation executing periodically the animated call back method.

      • restart

        void restart()
        Simply calls stop() and then start().

      • toggle

        void toggle()
        Toggles the animation

      • started

        boolean started()
        Returns true if animation was started and false otherwise.

      • timer

        SequentialTimer timer()
        Returns the sequential timer.
